Note: Participant does not notice a glare or rainbow effect when watching YouTube videos on phone while wearing glasses and claims it is comfortable.
Participant expresses a desire for MR glasses to automatically detect when they have stopped talking (WhatsApp speech to text) so YouTube video can continue playing without manually pressing play.
Participant expresses a bit of frustration about not receiving notification in the MR glasses while watching a YT video on the phone.

Participant notices YT video automatically played after they were done texting (speech to text on WhatsApp) and wonders what the difference was between that time and the last time it did not detect the moment they stopped speaking
Participant is hyperaware of neural band on wrist as it feels tight but expressed an appreciation for the responsiveness of MR glasses to hand gestures.
